name: RAG Document Assistant
description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation bot with file search capabilities

data.label: RAG Coordinator
data.system: You coordinate document search and response generation. First search for relevant information, then synthesize a comprehensive answer.
data.description: Coordinates document retrieval and answer generation

data.label: Document Searcher
data.system: You are an expert at searching and retrieving relevant information from documents. Use the file search tool to find pertinent information based on user queries.
data.description: Searches document database for relevant context

data.label: Answer Generator
data.system: You synthesize information from document search results into clear, comprehensive answers. Cite sources when possible.
data.description: Generates answers based on retrieved context

metadata.setupInstructions:
1. Upload documents to Azure AI vector store
2. Update vectorStoreId in File Search tool config
3. Configure OpenAI or Azure credentials
4. Test with document-related queries
